nodes.bodyText: nit: "For more instructions on how to run code coverage locally, follow instructions.." reads sort of funny, maybe one of the 'instructions' should be replaced with 'details' or some other word?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -183,7 +183,7 @@ jobs:
           --log-template "totals-complete"
           --log-template "errors"
           --
-          || { printf "
Diff code coverage check failed. To view coverage report, run 'mvn clean test jacoco:report' and open 'target/site/jacoco/index.html'
" && false; }
+          || { printf "

****FAILED****
Diff code coverage check failed. To view coverage report, run 'mvn clean test jacoco:report' and open 'target/site/jacoco/index.html'
For more instructions on how to run code coverage locally, follow instructions here - https://github.com/apache/druid/blob/master/dev/code-review/code-coverage.md#running-code-coverage-locally

" && false; }
